title: Царство грибов
overview: They are not plants, not animals, and not protozoa. And yet they are everywhere. Even inside you! Mushrooms. A magical kingdom, thanks to which life on the planet became what it is. A story about the main and most important discoveries of mycology. How to look for mushroom places. How to cook mushrooms so that they become not only tasty, but also useful. What dangers await an inexperienced mushroom picker in the forest. A mushroom picking trip is a real journey through the mushroom kingdom of Russia.
